brandStory.title: Our Story
brandStory.content: Founded in 2008, Slinx (Dongguan Shuishang Sports Goods Co., Ltd.) has been dedicated to providing high-quality diving and surfing apparel. Our team comes from a background of manufacturing for major international brands, bringing years of expertise to our own labels: SLINX and FINDSINE. We specialize in OEM/ODM services for wetsuits, rash guards, and other watersport gear, ensuring top-notch quality and innovation for every adventurer.

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.address: Address: 3-4F, No. 6, Kengzai Second Street, Quantang Industrial Zone, Liaobu Town, Dongguan City, Guangdong Province, China
